scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && npm run setup:local && npm run start:local
scripts.start:local: concurrently "npm run start:files" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:folders" "npm run start:jobs" "npm run start:config" "npm run start:gateway"
scripts.start:files: cd files-service && npm install && serverless offline --stage local --httpPort 3001
scripts.start:auth: cd auth-service && npm install && serverless offline --stage local --httpPort 3002
scripts.start:folders: cd folders-service && npm install && serverless offline --stage local --httpPort 3003
scripts.start:jobs: cd jobs-service && npm install && serverless offline --stage local --httpPort 3004
scripts.start:config: cd config-service && npm install && serverless offline --stage local --httpPort 3005
scripts.start:gateway: cd api-gateway-service && npm install && serverless offline --stage local --httpPort 3000
scripts.reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d && npm run setup:local
scripts.test:local: npm run test:files && npm run test:auth && npm run test:folders && npm run test:jobs
scripts.lint: npm run lint:files && npm run lint:auth && npm run lint:folders && npm run lint:jobs
